welcome_message_body: Welcome to Moreno Valley, where the warmth of the sun meets the charm of the city. Known for its beautiful parks, scenic views, and diverse culture, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that Moreno Valley has to offer.

restaurants.name: Taqueria 2 Potrillos
restaurants.description: Taqueria 2 Potrillos is a mexican restaurant located in Moreno Valley.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Banning Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Banning Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal

wifi.note: Free WiFi access is available throughout the airport.
